IVHOME.TITLE: Inventory Visibility Starter Page
IVHOME.DETAILS: The file ivhome.component.ts contains some more information about the utility classes and services available.
IVHOME.DESCRIPTION: IV getByTenantIdV1ConfigurationDistributionGroups response will be displayed on this page if IV end point is configured and reachable. In case of errors, they will be displayed in the browser console.
IVHOME.ERROR: Some error occurred while contacting IV. Refer to browser console or network tab for error details.
IVHOME.CHECK_IV_ENABLED: Cannot call IV APIs as IV is not enabled for the current tenant with id: {{tenant}}.
